JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Danish Speaking Customer Service and Content Writers, Birkirkara, Malta (373486)
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Job description

Founded in 2012 as part of a mission to provide players with the ultimate betting experience. Operating out of Malta, we currently offer Betting, Lotto and Casino, with more opportunities on the horizon. Continuing to sniff out new opportunities and put their best foot forward to ensure players get nothing less than the very best.

The role will include responding promptly and effectively to incoming customer emails, calls and chats whilst providing technical support to customers. The chosen candidate will also be responsible for the processing of KYC documents for verification and will be required to handle content and translations. (80% Customer Service, 20% Content/translations)

Flight - Paid back with first salary

Accommodation – We offer accommodation for your first week in Malta.

Other – We will help you with your paperwork etc. if candidate is not already located in Malta

Work Hours:

Monday-Sunday (40 hours) Work Shifts 9:00-18:00, 13:00-22:00, 12:00.20:00

Experience Experience with iGaming is an asset. C1/B2 English as minimum.

Requirements:

• Danish Language C1- C2

• English B1 B2

• Strong communication and written skills.

Benefits:

• Social activities at work

• Fitness

• Breakfast and snacks daily

• Language courses

• Health insurance

Training provided:

Training period 2 weeks one technical and practical. Training is offered by CS manager and seniors

Salary:

Euro 23,000 per Year

How will the interviews be held:

Skype interview or onsite interview

To apply:

CV and a covering email are to be sent by email to eures.recruitment.jobsplus@gov.mt and should be written in English. Please quote the vacancy name and number 373486 in your email.

Latest application date is 11.05.2022.

(from EURES Malta)

 

EURES står for European Employment Service og er et tilbud til alle EU-borgere, der ønsker at arbejde i et andet EU/EØS-land. Her finder du job i udlandet og information om jobsøgning i udlandet.

http://www.europa.eu/eures 

Følg os på Facebook "EURES Danmark"
